title: RE: Witness escalation
description:
Acknowledged. The hq-witness-role bead is missing from HQ beads. This is a Gas Town infrastructure issue. Created hq-8dj as a placeholder but the witness expects specific ID 'hq-witness-role'. Needs gt config fix.

Parsing engine work is COMPLETE - all 8 phase beads closed:
- types.ts (ace)
- context/ (warboy)  
- pipeline/ (imperator)
- confidence/ (organic)
- markdown/ (coma)
- learning/ (splendid)
- adapter/ (angharad)
- settings UI (immortan)
close_reason: Closed

title: ESCALATION: Witness cannot start - missing role bead
description:
The insight witness is down and cannot be started. Error: 'loading witness role config: parsing bd show output: unexpected end of JSON input'

Investigation shows:
- ins-insight-witness bead exists and references role_bead: hq-witness-role
- hq-witness-role bead does NOT exist in HQ beads

This is a configuration issue. The role bead needs to be created for the witness to start.

Please advise or create the missing hq-witness-role bead.
